name: UTextLayoutWidget
doc:
Base class for all widgets that use a text layout.
Contains the common options that should be exposed for the underlying Slate widget.

ShapedTextOptions: Controls how the text within this widget should be shaped.
WrapTextAt: Whether text wraps onto a new line when it's length exceeds this width; if this value is zero or negative, no wrapping occurs.
Margin: The amount of blank space left around the edges of text area.
LineHeightPercentage: The amount to scale each lines height by.
ApplyLineHeightToBottomLine: Whether to leave extra space below the last line due to line height.
Justification: How the text should be aligned with the margin.
AutoWrapText: True if we're wrapping text automatically based on the computed horizontal space for this widget.
